thread.title: A history tour with an edible twist
thread.title_full: A history tour with an edible twist - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: A history tour with an edible twist
text:
BURLINGTON, Vt. - If you are a fan of good food, Burlington has plenty to offer. From great restaurants to farmers markets to specialty food stores, there's something for everyone.
Our Taylor Young recently met with two women who took their love for food and passion for Vermont history, and created a walking edible history tour through the streets of downtown Burlington.
To find out more about the tour, you can visit burlingtonediblehistory.com .
Watch the video for more information.
